channel.title: CVE Feed for kamadak -- exif-rs
channel.description: The latest CVEs for kamadak -- exif-rs

item.title: CVE-2021-21235|2024-08-03T18:09:14.897Z -- kamadak -- exif-rs
item.description: kamadak-exif is an exif parsing library written in pure Rust. In kamadak-exif version 0.5.2, there is an infinite loop in parsing crafted PNG files. Specifically, reader::read_from_container can cause an infinite loop when a crafted PNG file is given. This is fixed in version 0.5.3. No workaround is available. Applications that do not pass files with the PNG signature to Reader::read_from_container are not affected.
